blogPost.title: How did you get celebrity investors to back you? Answer by Deon Nicholas (@dojiboy9). Co-Founder & CEO @forethought_ai. https://t.co/5xejCfo0Yl https://t.co/7FcKJ1vJZw
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: どうやって有名人の投資家に支援してもらったのですか？回答者：Deon Nicholas（@dojiboy9）さん。共同創業者 & CEO @forethought_ai. https://t.co/5xejCfo0Yl https://t.co/7FcKJ1vJZw
你是如何让名人投资者支持你的？由Deon Nicholas (@dojiboy9)回答。联合创始人& CEO @forethought_ai. https://t.co/5xejCfo0Yl https://t.co/7FcKJ1vJZw
你是如何讓名人投資者支持你的？由Deon Nicholas (@dojiboy9)回答。聯合創始人& CEO @forethought_ai. https://t.co/5xejCfo0Yl https://t.co/7FcKJ1vJZw

previous.title: What is the process for naming OPI nail polishes? Answer by Suzi Weiss-Fischmann (@1stladyofcolors), co-founder, and creative visionary behind @OPI_PRODUCTS. https://t.co/dvsIBTsphK https://t.co/7BKKnHKLER

localize.full_text: OPIのネイルポリッシュのネーミングにはどのようなプロセスがありますか？回答者：Suzi Weiss-Fischmann（@1stladyofcolors）、共同設立者、そして@OPI_PRODUCTSのクリエイティブ・ヴィジョナリー。https://t.co/dvsIBTsphK https://t.co/7BKKnHKLER
命名OPI指甲油的过程是怎样的？回答者：Suzi Weiss-Fischmann (@1stladyofcolors)，联合创始人，以及@OPI_PRODUCTS的创意者。https://t.co/dvsIBTsphK https://t.co/7BKKnHKLER
命名OPI指甲油的過程是怎樣的？回答者：Suzi Weiss-Fischmann (@1stladyofcolors)，聯合創始人，以及@OPI_PRODUCTS的創意者。https://t.co/dvsIBTsphK https://t.co/7BKKnHKLER

next.title: What are your best tips for navigating difficult conversations? Answer by @xsvengoechea, Author of Listen Like You Mean It. https://t.co/sbcG6oqjRH https://t.co/JPZpCgnXx5

localize.full_text: 難しい会話を乗り越えるためのベストなヒントを教えてください。Answer by @xsvengoechea, Author of Listen Like You Mean It. https://t.co/sbcG6oqjRH https://t.co/JPZpCgnXx5
你有哪些驾驭困难对话的最佳技巧？回答者：@xsvengoechea, Listen Like You Mean It的作者。https://t.co/sbcG6oqjRH https://t.co/JPZpCgnXx5
你有哪些駕馭困難對話的最佳技巧？回答者：@xsvengoechea, Listen Like You Mean It的作者。https://t.co/sbcG6oqjRH https://t.co/JPZpCgnXx5
